tip.title: Tip for this Strain
tip.default: Enjoy this strain on an empty stomach for best effect.

safety.title: General Safety Guidelines
items: Always drink Kava on an empty stomach (3-4 hours after eating)
Start with a lower dosage and gradually increase
Reverse Tolerance: The effects may be weaker the first few times
Never combine Kava with alcohol or medications
In case of liver disease or pregnancy: No Kava

about.title: About this Calculator
about.text: The calculated values are guidelines based on average Kavalactone contents and experiences. The actual effect may vary depending on individual sensitivity, batch, and manufacturer.

items.title: Strain Potency
items.text: Different strains have varying Kavalactone contents. A 5-star strain like Loa Waka requires less powder than a milder 3-star strain like Pouni Ono.

items.title: Body Weight
items.text: Heavier individuals generally require more Kava for the same effect. The calculator adjusts the recommendation accordingly.

items.title: Preparation Method
items.text: Instant/Micronized Kava is more concentrated than Medium Grind. The blender method extracts slightly more efficiently than traditional kneading.

items.title: Experience Level
items.text: Due to 'Reverse Tolerance', experienced users often need less Kava for the same effect. Beginners should start with low doses.
